pkgmetadata.longdescription: # `dbami`: The database friend you didn't know you neededA lightweight, Python-based, framework-agnostic, async-compatible PostgreSQLmigration tool.## What does `dbami` mean?`dbami` was initially inspired by the tool[`dbmate`](https://gitbub.com/amacneil/dbmate), and therefore takes inspirationfrom `dbmate` when it comes to name. That is, "ami" is French for "friend," asynonym of "mate."Other languages may have yielded suitable words for friend, but "ami" waschosen due to its short length (easier to type) and the allowance for a futuregolang-based implementation, which, most serendipitously, could be named`dbamigo`.
